message.body: Hey, I keep meaning to suggest that we hang out before I leave on Wednesday and you leave for San Francisco. I'd understand if you don't want to, but I'd like
to say goodbye. Knowing you has meant a lot to me, I don't just want to take off and never talk again. We could even just have lunch or something. Let me know.
Hey! No, I'd love to do something before we both leave. You leave on Wednesday?
Yeah on Wednesday. Sorry for late reply. I'm moving my shit into Joey's tomorrow. So we could hang out tomorrow night t when I get back from my mom's on Monday
Yeah, joey told me you're using his shed or whatever. Tomorrow's fine, or next week. I don't really have anything else going on.
